author: tjayrush
content: <@!350420381930356736> <@!520564582196969472> Etherscan's numbers do not correctly reflect issuance. I spent a lot of time looking into this when I was adding numbers to `eth-total-supply` using TrueBlocks.  I can't remember exactly why, but it was very clear their numbers were wrong.

author: tjayrush
content: Something like they were reporting the `end of first block of a new day`  as the value for the previous day. So it was off by one day and one block.
